metadata.synopsis: One liner for Dwarven male LOW_BaldursMouth_StreetGossiper_000, just an average citizen on the streets.Has extra one liner variations for if the positive or negative newspaper article has been published.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the dwarf located at ~ 9, 38, -18 in CTY_Main_A

0.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
0.text: Look - I don't want your wares, I don't want to donate to anything, I'm just chatting with my friend. Excuse yourself.

1.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
1.text: Listen mate, I'm honoured, but ain't you got better things to do than chatter with me? You know, big heroics. Newsworthy stuff.

2.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
2.text: Can't believe Gortash's gone. Thought he was bloody invincible, way the broadsheets nattered on about him.

3.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
3.text: Well, well well. If it ain't the great hero the gazette's been harping on about. Look at you.

4.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
4.text: Sorry mate, trying to have a conflab here. No offence.

5.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
5.text: Oi, listen - oh. It's you. From the... uh, article. Ahem. I don't want any trouble, pal. Please.
5.context: NodeContext: nervous, he's heard how terrible you are

6.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
6.text: Come on, mate. I heard what you did in the gazette - I don't want anything to do with you.

7.speaker: 'Bigmouth' Thimsen
7.text: Look mate, excuse yourself. Dead lords won't gossip about themselves.
